org.hibernate.search.engine.service.spi

Interface Startable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultElasticsearchAnalyzerDefinitionTranslator, DefaultElasticsearchClientFactory, DefaultElasticsearchService, DefaultIndexManagerFactory, DefaultLockFactoryCreator, DispatchMessageSender, ElasticsearchLuceneQueryTranslator, ElasticsearchNestingContextFactoryProvider, LuceneWorkSerializerImpl, PropertiesBasedLuceneAnalysisDefinitionSourceService

    public interface Startable
    Lifecycle contract for services which wish to be notified when it is time to start.
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik

      Start phase notification.
